## How to switch skins

Render with one of the profiles:

- Posit: `quarto preview --profile posit`
- EHU EU: `quarto preview --profile ehu-eu`
- EHU ES: `quarto preview --profile ehu-es`

*(Copy your Inter variable files and EHU font files into the folders under `_extensions/thermomat/ehu/fonts/…` for full fidelity.)*
